channel.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
channel.description: I've been trying to post my server for the 5th on mopar, but each time it gets rejected... idk y i got pictures to proove it's a real server and not rat there even watermarked. my server is online i have people playing on it right now....Could i possibly be geting rejected because i already have another server on here and they think it's the same?kinda weird since ports are different -.-

item.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

Davidi2:

I checked and he hasn’t abused the status page with multiple accounts, but he does have multiple registered users…

yh cuz he first account was for my first server but than i changed the ip cuz i didn’t like it and i had to make a new account to post another updated one, but the last one i told to mod to delete and it has been. so can i register this server too? or not? cuz not to be rude, but we all know i can just register it from a different ip and it would just make things easier if u let me do it from this account

Read full topic
item.source: How come my server always gets rejected?

item.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

Vexillum:

If you already have another server, I’d suggest just making a new acc and adding your server there.

Did you really just say that?

Read full topic

item.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

vovik:

I’ve been trying to post my server for the 5th on mopar, but each time it gets rejected… idk y i got pictures to proove it’s a real server and not rat there even watermarked. my server is online i have people playing on it right now…Could i possibly be geting rejected because i already have another server on here and they think it’s the same?kinda weird since ports are different -.-

vovik:

I don’t get it its stupid don’t they realise its a whole different server -.- dif forums dif name dif port like wtf? And its not like I’m using the same acc this acc has no registered servers so that’s not y I’m getin denied.

Anyone want to do an ip trace/account check?

Read full topic
item.source: How come my server always gets rejected?

@vovik wrote:

I don’t get it its stupid don’t they realise its a whole different server -.- dif forums dif name dif port like wtf? And its not like I’m using the same acc this acc has no registered servers so that’s not y I’m getin denied.

item.source: How come my server always gets rejected?

item.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:10, topic:402288”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=499343.msg3652558#msg3652558 date=1309824749]

If you already have another server, I’d suggest just making a new acc and adding your server there.

I’d suggest not doing that, since that will get you banned. (multiple accounts are against the rules)
[/quote]

Oh, I did not know this… A long time ago I had acc but I forgot pass so I made this acc… is that okay?[/quote]
The rules on multiple accounts have become more lenient. What you did probably wont get you banned, but purposely creating multiple accounts to get around things will.

Read full topic
item.source: How come my server always gets rejected?

item.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:402288”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=499343.msg3652556#msg3652556 date=1309824654]
If you already have another server, I’d suggest just making a new acc and adding your server there.
[/quote]

I’d suggest not doing that, since that will get you banned. (multiple accounts are against the rules)[/quote]

Oh, I did not know this… A long time ago I had acc but I forgot pass so I made this acc… is that okay?

item.title: How come my server always gets rejected?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“vovik, post:6, topic:402288”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=499343.msg3651841#msg3651841 date=1309794036]
Patience.
[/quote]

it’s been almost two weeks -.-[/quote]
You can only advertise one server at a time on the status list. So if you already have one up (which you said you do) anymore will keep getting denied.

Read full topic
